description: Extract entities related to a specified topic from the supplied input text. Returns the entities and the source text

input_variables.name: input
input_variables.description: The text from which the entities are to be extracted

input_variables.name: topic
input_variables.description: The topic of interest; the extracted entities should be related to this topic

input_variables.name: example_entities
input_variables.description: A list of example entities from the topic. This can help guide the entity extraction
